aboutMe.paragraph: Passionate iOS developer with a background in mechanical engineering and software development. I began programming during the pandemic with Harvard's CS50 and later specialized in Swift and iOS. Through personal projects and an internship at Tüpraş, I gained hands-on experience. I am eager to learn new technologies, adapt to challenges, and build high-quality applications.

E6B Flight Pro.title: E6B Flight Pro
E6B Flight Pro.description: E6B Flight Pro is a precise digital replica of the classic E6B flight computer, built for pilots, student aviators, and aviation enthusiasts.
E6B Flight Pro.short: A digital replica of the E6B flight computer for pilots and aviation students.

TravelPlanner.title: TravelPlanner
TravelPlanner.description: An AI-powered iOS travel planning application that helps users discover and explore destinations. It leverages Google's Gemini AI along with interactive maps, onboarding, authentication, and local persistence.
TravelPlanner.short: An AI-powered iOS travel planning application that helps users discover and explore destinations.

Aircraft Identifier.title: Aircraft Identifier
Aircraft Identifier.description: An iOS application for identifying aircraft from photos using AI-powered image analysis.
Aircraft Identifier.short: An iOS application for identifying aircraft from photos using AI-powered image analysis.

MyMovieApp.title: MyMovieApp
MyMovieApp.description: A SwiftUI-based movie app that lets users explore movies and stay updated with the latest releases. This app features API integration for fetching movie data, caching using Core Data, user-friendly interface.
MyMovieApp.short: A movie discovery app with API integration and offline caching.

ATPL Tester.title: ATPL Tester
ATPL Tester.description: Modern iOS app designed to help users prepare for the Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL) exams.
ATPL Tester.short: Modern iOS app designed to help users prepare for the Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL) exams.

GLOOMHAVEN ATTACKER.title: Gloomhaven Attacker
GLOOMHAVEN ATTACKER.description: Helper app for the Gloomhaven boardgame.
GLOOMHAVEN ATTACKER.short: A helper app for managing attacks in the Gloomhaven board game.

contact.subheader: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it and discuss how we can bring your iOS app idea to life.

form.title: Send me a message
form.subject: Subject
form.validation_invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

info.title: Get in touch
info.description: I'm always excited to work on new iOS projects and collaborate with amazing teams. Whether you need a new app built from scratch or want to improve an existing one, let's discuss how I can help bring your vision to life.
